data.title: Janet Kay & Carroll Thompson
data.meta_description: Janet Kay & Carroll Thompson by Soul Mama - Sunday, September 29, 2024 06:30 PM at Gantry Hotel (Curio Collection by Hilton), London, E201DB, Great Britain. Buy tickets and find information on Universe.
data.text:
Soul Mama

Gantry Hotel (Curio Collection by Hilton), London, E201DB, Great Britain England

51.546962 -0.00782

Description

PART OF LOVERS ROCK SUNDAYS JANET KAY & CARROLL THOMPSON are award winning singer songwriters, regarded as the Queens of Lovers Rock, a genre that is quintessential British and much loved; music that crosses and fuses an exciting and unique blend of Reggae, Soul and Pop. Janet Kay’s chart topping single Silly games put her in the Music Guinness book of records for becoming the first British born black female Reggae artist to have a No.1 in the British pop charts. Carroll Thompson’s iconic self produced and penned album Hopelessly in love was voted the Best Lovers Rock album of all time.Janet Kay also received an MBE for services to music in King Charles III 2023 honours list. Carroll Thompson & Janet Kay voted on the list of ‘100 Great Black Britons’ & Barclays Women of Merit winners. Joining together their musical forces, these two talented women have once again created music history as Britain's first female Reggae supergroup! They have sold Platinum & Gold records for Sony Japan and Toshiba EMI.With a carefully selected all star band of celebrated musicians; Kendrick Rowe (Aswad, PJ Harvey, The Specials, Anne Lennox) Colin McNeish (UB40, Omar, Finley Quayle) Adrian Mc Kensie (Soul II Soul, Luciano, Freddy McGregor) Lex Cameron (Omar, Heatwave, Chaka Khan) Stanley Andrews, (Billy Ocean, Aswad, Maxi Priest,). Performing their thrilling live show to music lovers worldwide from the UK, Europe, USA to Japan.

Times
